dimensions.name: Time
dimensions.description: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. This dimension is set automatically.
dimensions.helpText: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. This dimension is set automatically.

dimensions.name: CP Code
dimensions.description: Unique identifier for the contract associated with a particular stream, used for billing purposes.
dimensions.helpText: Unique identifier for the contract associated with a particular stream, used for billing purposes.

dimensions.name: Stream ID
dimensions.description: Unique identifier for the stream that is generated when the stream is initially configured.
dimensions.helpText: Unique identifier for the stream that is generated when the stream is initially configured.

dimensions.name: Unique End Point
dimensions.description: The URL path after the Stream ID in the ingest URL. For manifest files, the file name is part of the Unique End Point. For segment requests, the file name is omitted. Also indicates the bit rate of the stream.
dimensions.helpText: The URL path after the Stream ID in the ingest URL. For manifest files, the file name is part of the Unique End Point. For segment requests, the file name is omitted. Also indicates the bit rate of the stream.

dimensions.name: Entry Point
dimensions.description: IP address of the Entry Point on which stream is ingested.
dimensions.helpText: IP address of the Entry Point on which stream is ingested.

dimensions.name: File Type
dimensions.description: File extension of the requested object as extracted from the URL.
dimensions.helpText: File extension of the requested object as extracted from the URL.

dimensions.name: File Extension
dimensions.description: File Extension of the ingested object as extracted from the URL.
dimensions.helpText: File Extension of the ingested object as extracted from the URL.

metrics.name: Avg Packet Loss
metrics.description: Measures the quality of the connection between the Encoder and the Entry Point. Provides connection level ratio of data packets (bytes) lost to the data packets (bytes) sent by the Encoder.
metrics.helpText: Measures the quality of the connection between the Encoder and the Entry Point. Provides connection level ratio of data packets (bytes) lost to the data packets (bytes) sent by the Encoder.

metrics.name: Error Rate
metrics.description: Percentage rate of errors occurring in a given time period.
metrics.helpText: Percentage rate of errors occurring in a given time period.

metrics.name: Avg Path Time
metrics.description: Average time taken from source to destination.
metrics.helpText: Average time taken from source to destination.

metrics.name: 2xx Ingest Hits
metrics.description: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned successful response codes in the 200 to 299 range.
metrics.helpText: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned successful response codes in the 200 to 299 range.

metrics.name: Avg Bitrate
metrics.description: Average amount of data transferred in a time period, calculated in terms of bits per second. Expressed in kbps, Mbps, Gbps etc.
metrics.helpText: Average amount of data transferred in a time period, calculated in terms of bits per second. Expressed in kbps, Mbps, Gbps etc.

metrics.name: Ingest Hits
metrics.description: Total number of requests made to the entry point posting objects.
metrics.helpText: Total number of requests made to the entry point posting objects.

metrics.name: 3xx Ingest Hits
metrics.description: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned redirect response codes in the 300 to 399 range.
metrics.helpText: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned redirect response codes in the 300 to 399 range.

metrics.name: 4xx Ingest Hits
metrics.description: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned client error response codes in the 400 to 499 range.
metrics.helpText: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned client error response codes in the 400 to 499 range.

metrics.name: 5xx Ingest Hits
metrics.description: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned server error response codes in the 500 to 599 range.
metrics.helpText: Number of requests made to the entry point posting objects that returned server error response codes in the 500 to 599 range.

metrics.name: Avg Latency
metrics.description: Indicates the delay between Encoder and Entry Point when sending a unit of media payload.
metrics.helpText: Indicates the delay between Encoder and Entry Point when sending a unit of media payload.
